reasoning: Intracranial venous sinus thrombosis (IVST) global incidence estimated ~0.5-1.5 per 100k from Cochrane review. Risk factors include thrombophilia, infection, malignancy, and pregnancy. Acute condition with incidence metric appropriate.
source: Dentali F et al. (2008). Cerebral venous thrombosis: a meta-analysis of observed risk factors and innocent exposures. J Thromb Haemost. 6(7):1043-1050
